scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --workspace=hostbuildtime" "npm run build --workspace=header-app" "npm run build --workspace=main-app" "npm run build --workspace=footer-app"
scripts.cleanmodules: rm -rf headerApp/node_modules mainApp/node_modules footerApp/node_modules hostbuildtime/node_modules node_modules
scripts.cleanall: npm run cleandist && npm run cleanmodules
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run cleandist && npm run build
